subject: Football
lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Sept. 16 (AP) — Donovan McNabb had shown only flashes of his running skills in the N.F.L. until a game against the Washington Redskins seven years ago turned him into an elite scrambling quarterback.
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, Sept. 16 (AP) — Donovan McNabb had shown only flashes of his running skills in the N.F.L. until a game against the Washington Redskins seven years ago turned him into an elite scrambling quarterback.
